com.chdryra.android.reviewer

Class FragmentReviewComments

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.chdryra.android.mygenerallibrary.FragmentDeleteDone
        • com.chdryra.android.reviewer.FragmentReviewGrid<T>
          • com.chdryra.android.reviewer.FragmentReviewGridAddEditDone<GVCommentList.GVComment>
            • com.chdryra.android.reviewer.FragmentReviewComments 

  • public class FragmentReviewComments
extends FragmentReviewGridAddEditDone<GVCommentList.GVComment>
    UI Fragment: comments. Each grid cell shows a comment headline or comment sentence depending whether the "Show sentences" ActionBar icon is pressed.

    FragmentReviewGrid functionality:

    • Subject: disabled
    • RatingBar: disabled
    • Banner button: launches DialogCommentAddFragment
    • Grid cell click: launches DialogCommentEditFragment
    • Grid cell long click: same as click

    Also an ActionBar icon for switching between comment headlines and comment sentences.

    See Also:
    ActivityReviewComments, DialogCommentAddFragment, DialogCommentEditFragment
